newsitem.title: TURKEY: Tupras buys 27kt gasoline, sells 21kt gas oil.
newsitem.headline: Tupras buys 27kt gasoline, sells 21kt gas oil.

text.p: Turkey's state oil refinery Tupras said on Tuesday it was importing 27,000 tonnes of gasoline from Total and exporting 21,000 tonnes of heavy vacuum gas oil (HVGO) to Vitol in tenders.
It said in a statement the gasoline import would be made on May 24-26 from Constanza at a discount of $17.12 per tonne.
The HVGO export would be made on June 3-5 from Izmir at a premium of $18.01 per tonne.
All prices are based on fob Mediterranean Italy quotations.
Tupras held the tenders on May 9 and May 12 respectively.
